mapper.select: SELECT count(agree.id) as agreeNum, count(case when agree.state in(1,2,3) then 1 end ) notAuditAgreement, count(case when agree.state = 4 then 1 end ) auditAgreement FROM bus_agreement_audit audit left join bus_agreement agree on agree.id = audit.agreement_id where agree.is_delete = 0 and audit.lawyer_id = #{condition.lawyerId}
